answers.answer: Most doctors will schedule you to be induced. Talk to your doc tell them how your feeling.  I was scheduled for my induction in two hours. The hospital called saying they are full. (A full hospital?) Nothing has been off with my blood sugars or baby (currently about 7lbs +) seen no point in the induction but they pushed so i agreed. If you feel as if its right then do it.

I have gestational diabetes...hoping I don't have it after baby born even tho my dad Is a diabetic...I'm measuring big also...have gained 45 lbs...hope he comes out on his on @ 37 wks bc this is rough...
The Dr. woul normally induce you before the 40 weeks. Mine told me he will induce me next week, I'll be 39w. I'm 38w1d.

question: Found out I had diabetes around 29 weeks and I'm now 38 weeks and 5 days and my sons measuring 8 pounds.. I really want to have a natural birth... Should I ask to be induced?? Or should I just wait..  Please help!
title: Having Diabetes During Pregnacy!
